channel.title: Earnings
channel.description: Corporate Company Earnings, Find Earnings Per Share and Earnings History Online

item.title: Walmart tops earnings estimates, wins back grocery shoppers as inflation heats up
item.description: Walmart raised its forecast for the year and said it's using its size to navigate through rising costs.

item.title: Home Depot earnings top estimates fueled by 9.8% jump in sales as consumers fix up homes
item.description: Shares of Home Depot have climbed 39% this year, giving it a market value of $392 billion.

item.title: Shares of EV start-up Lucid rise after executives confirm new reservations, 2022 vehicle production
item.description: The company on Monday said it has more than 17,000 reservations for its Air sedan, up from 13,000 through the third quarter.

item.title: WeWork shows more losses in its first quarterly report as a public company
item.description: WeWork said total revenue for the quarter was $661 million, up 11% from the previous quarter.

item.title: Warby Parker sales rise 32% as eyeglass retailer's losses widen in third quarter
item.description: Warby Parker reported Friday that its third-quarter revenue rose 32% from year-ago levels, but its losses widened.

item.title: Lordstown Motors delays Endurance EV pickup production due to supplier issues, shares fall
item.description: Commercial production and deliveries of Lordstown Motors' all-electric pickup called the Endurance is once again being pushed back, the company said Thursday.

item.title: Coach owner Tapestry shares rise on upbeat outlook and abating supply chain fears
item.description: Coach owner Tapestry shares rose after the high-end handbag owner hiked its revenue forecast for the year.

item.title: Opendoor thrives in home-flipping market Zillow just exited as earnings beat estimates
item.description: Opendoor shares surged in after-market trading on Wednesday as third-quarter results exceeded analysts' estimates.

item.title: Affirm shares soar after company announces expanded deal with Amazon, fiscal Q1 revenues beat estimates
item.description: Affirm shares soared in after-hours trading Wednesday, after the company announced it would expand its Amazon deal and that it beat on fiscal Q1 revenue.

item.title: Disney earnings miss across the board with slowing streaming growth
item.description: Disney reported earnings after the bell. Here are the results.

item.title: Beyond Meat shares crater as losses mount, company expects weak U.S. sales growth ahead
item.description: Beyond Meat reported a wider-than-expected loss for its fourth quarter and revenue that fell short of analysts' estimates.

item.title: Coinbase shares drop after third-quarter revenue misses analysts' estimates
item.description: Coinbase reported weaker-than-expected revenue figures in the third quarter and a drop in monthly active users from the prior period.

item.title: DoorDash stock rockets on deal to acquire international delivery platform Wolt for $8.1 billion
item.description: Wolt currently has about 4,000 employees and operates in 23 countries.

item.title: PayPal issues disappointing revenue forecast for next year; announces Venmo deal with Amazon
item.description: PayPal on Monday reported third-quarter earnings that were weaker than analysts expected even and issued a disappointing forecast.

item.title: Roblox soars as it reports that revenue doubled in third quarter
item.description: Roblox said user growth for its video game continued in the third quarter, with the company. now averaging 47 million each day.

item.title: AMC posts narrower-than-expected loss, but CEO says there are still pandemic challenges ahead
item.description: AMC Entertainment shares fell more than 5% in extended trading Monday even though its third-quarter loss was narrower than expected.

item.title: Berkshire's operating earnings pop 18% last quarter with Buffett's cash pile at record $149 billion
item.description: The conglomerate reported operating income $6.47 billion in the third quarter, rising 18% from $5.48 billion from the same quarter a year ago.

item.title: Peloton shares fall 25% as company posts wider-than-expected loss and slashes full-year outlook
item.description: The company slashed its outlook for the full year amid softened demand for its exercise equipment and ongoing supply chain challenges.

item.title: Uber revenue up 72% from last year, but Didi stake contributes to big loss
item.description: Uber reported third-quarter financial results Thursday that included a first-ever adjusted EBITDA profit.

item.title: Airbnb profits surge 280% in third quarter
item.description: The company saw its highest-ever revenue and net income in the third quarter.

item.title: Pinterest beats on earnings and revenue even as monthly user number drops
item.description: Pinterest on Thursday released its third-quarter earnings, which showed better-than-expected profit and revenue.

item.title: Sunrun revenue doubles as customer count tops 600,000
item.description: The residential solar installer added 30,698 customers during the third quarter, bringing its total customer count to 630,441.

item.title: First Solar's sales decline amid ongoing supply chain bottlenecks
item.description: Shares of First Solar slid in extended trading after the company's third-quarter revenue missed expectations.

item.title: Moderna shares fall after company cuts 2021 forecast for Covid vaccine sales
item.description: Moderna shares fell Thursday after it cut its Covid-19 vaccine sales forecast for the year and missed earnings and revenue expectations for the third quarter.

item.title: Credit Suisse scales back investment banking as earnings beat estimates
item.description: The Swiss bank also revealed that it expects to report a net loss in the fourth quarter and said it plans to scale back its investment banking operations.

item.title: Roku shares drop after streaming company misses revenue estimates
item.description: Roku shares dropped in after-hours trading Wednesday after the company reported a third-quarter revenue that missed expectations.

item.title: Qualcomm shares pop after company reports earnings beat, 56% rise in smartphone chip sales
item.description: Qualcomm's revenue beat Wall Street expectations, driven by chip sales for smartphones, which were up 56% despite a global chip shortage.

item.title: SunPower CEO says company is going on 'offense' as demand for solar rises
item.description: Solar company SunPower's third-quarter revenue disappointed the Street.

item.title: CVS Health beats on earnings, gets lift from Covid vaccines and prescription volumes
item.description: The drugstore chain has gotten a boost from Covid-19 vaccines and the return of more typical pharmacy patterns.

item.title: Freshworks sinks after software maker's first quarterly earnings report since IPO
item.description: Freshworks contends with enterprise-software heavyweights such as Oracle and Salesforce.
